name: google-mcp-server
description: MCP Server for Google Gmail and Calendar with write access
long_description: Allows Claude to interact with Gmail (send emails, create drafts) and Google Calendar (create, update, delete events) with full write permissions.

token_path.description: Path to your Google OAuth token.json file (created by authenticate.py)

credentials_path.description: Path to your Google OAuth credentials.json file
